# About

R Markdown template for exercises of statistics courses in Aalto University.

# Features

Metadata related to the course can be given in the YAML header. Metadata can include the following fields:

1. Course name
2. Exercise name
3. University
4. Department
5. Lecturer
6. Assistant

This template also includes a bibliography file containing a single reference [@rmarkdown]. Template uses \texttt{bibtex} for managing references and the bibliography style is set to \texttt{authoryear}.

The YAML header of this template looks like the following.
```
---
course-name: Statistics Course
exercise-name: Exercise Set 0
university: Aalto University
department: Department of Mathematics and Systems Analysis
lecturer: Lecturer
assistant: Assistant
bibliography: sources.bib
output: perejrmd::stat_exercise
---
```
